documents.document: I will always be grateful to @MindCharity for providing a safe space to talk without judgement or feeling trapped like in wards #timetotalk

@Arf_22 There is very little reaching out. People seem to fear being seen as trying to convert if they mention it 😪
@Arf_22 Thanks! It's an American thing really, I don't know many in the UK of any faith

@WelshTeacup @cliodiaspora To be fair, they will success or failure and it'll be his legacy success or failure, that's what historians do...
@PhilipGMerry @Danny_BoyUK I've lost my faith in humanity 😪

@Danny_BoyUK She voted for the 2nd reading 😮

@teaisfortina Yeah I know what you mean. Some of my suppliers are like a bloggers' dream, I could just about get my hands on anything trendy

@teaisfortina I loved rose gold before it was a thing. Now only my iPhone is rose gold.

@chralie Princesses sleep on double beds alone 😏

I’ve booked my ticket for the @ToryProgress conference https://t.co/rPSP7AadBb. Who else is going of you lovely lot?
"Let’s use this new year to see our places as exactly where we need to be" <3 @thefiskfiles https://t.co/e3IzOh8L4Y via @blessedisshe__
@smellystudent I'd turn into the drunkard from the Little Prince more likely, and then maybe sleep 😛
@Hass_Aslam Thanks :)
@LifeOfBeaa It's given for arthritis too apparently. My GP knows already I have problems so should be ok with trying 🤔
@LifeOfBeaa Amitriptyline is what google gave me when looked for it so I guess that's the one. Thanks :)
@Hass_Aslam Tried it before, it didn't help really :(
@Iain_Whiteley I'd probably end up drinking a whole bottle crying in the glass etc 😔
Good people of Twitter, what's the best sleeping pill? And by that I mean you sleep almost straight away, no time to think about stuff...
Okay. Why when you try to forget about someone it seems that you pick up all the films on Netflix with the 2 or so… https://t.co/MmaXRUjEdC

@rosysparkles She too was a History mayor like me 💙 I love her.

@pyrodiepyrolive @lettertodaddy Why “lol”? It’s not like the world already thinks of us as Elsie de Wolfe and Elizabeth Marbury or anything
Trying to get as much as possible done before @thebloggershub_ chat so I can just curl up in bed with Chinese food… https://t.co/W8XY4IbivC
[Valentine] @theblondpond's Valentine should be @lettertodaddy! Who should be yours? via https://t.co/uQGNlnr1d4 https://t.co/5pebcjI2dN
@thecrownwings @thebloggershub_ Whoop. Most of my memories of Manchester have to do with being drenched, drunk or both 😐neeevermind
@thebloggershub_ Same 😂 I’m also running out of coffee which isn’t great as it’s my first working day after being ill 😭
.@samrsparrow @learice What fashion since Christian Dior was alive isn’t? Seriously…
@thebloggershub_ Good morning! How are you on this err “fine” day? (Although it’s a big country, maybe it’s nicer w… https://t.co/up6X5IUAPX
So @SamRSparrow asks what trends we don’t give a pebble about and @learice goes “Crop tops” and I go https://t.co/ELINzByHmB
This situation is taking us in some very interesting directions… https://t.co/JgmCfyzTEa
It’s Monday, I’m still not well and my to-do list is catching up with me but new ep on @UnsorryMag about trends 😍🙌🏻 https://t.co/4aQ7eV8PWB
@joe_pattinson @lettertodaddy I'm scared to find out mine if it's neither of you 👀
@cjlatimer16 @PyroDiePyroLive I love you both bbz 💙
@cjlatimer16 @PyroDiePyroLive You're cute, looking at how many adoring fans you have 😛
@Mode_Lily That's fair 😊
@Mode_Lily I love cooking but wouldn't mind that sometimes. Especially so I don't miss chats 😂 #tbhchat
@thebloggershub_ I've never had either 👀 #tbhchat
@Mode_Lily And this is why I'm single 😛
@thebloggershub_ The real Q is how you drink that thing 😐🙈#tbhchat
@alibourke9 @thebloggershub_ The problem is work comes 1st then dissertation then essays so readings are always abandoned 😔
@damawa42 I will not comment on what I suspect is your comment 😛
@damawa42 I don't mind B although I prefer C as I don't need to move people for the loo. I always get put in A 😔
@thebloggershub_ @YouTube A4 Nobody knows how I'm even graduating 😂 #tbhchat
@Mode_Lily @inkimmyshead @thebloggershub_ Or making coffee. Or going to buy red bull when things get tragic 😂🙈 #tbhchat
@RebeccaWbu_94 @thebloggershub_ Can I drop some of mine on you? I'm miss popular all of a sudden and I'm like "I just want to plot w/ Joe" 😂
@RebeccaWbu_94 @thebloggershub_ I've actually done it 😂 and all apps closed on the laptop. It worked
I've procrastinated joining 😂 #tbhchat https://t.co/9692QT89gx
@chralie Screw that. Mine's Chris Philip 😏
@chralie Yes. Although most are no use to me 😂
@chralie Is coming to party conference with me and the cute Tory boys other than the only one who made the list not enough? 😱
@chralie @joe_pattinson @DavidJeffery_ You should be a Tory 😂
@chralie @joe_pattinson @DavidJeffery_ I googled that blog. Could have put my money on the first Tory name to appear 😂 (Joe you can guess)
@chralie @joe_pattinson @DavidJeffery_ Stop being so thirsty you lot. How did I not know there's a fit cllrs Tumblr?
@damawa42 How exactly can they scare off middle bookings? You needed a seat, that could have been two separate people 😐
@joe_pattinson @DavidJeffery_ I wasn't going to be THAT vulgar but we're all thinking the same thing 😂
@Daveyboy89 @PinkNews I have FTM trans friends who feel invalidated by the whole idea of men giving birth actually...
Love this https://t.co/ouP7QnGtTd
